job_description:
Job Description: I am currently recruiting for a Senior Full Stack Developer. As a key member of their growing company, you'll have a pivotal role in crafting and sustaining their advanced tech framework. If you have experience with Ruby on Rails and JavaScript, this position may be for you! Here's a chance to be part of a dynamic, forward-thinking company, collaborate with a skilled team, and leave a substantial mark in the industry. This is a permanent full-time position, available to anyone located in Windsor. This is a hybrid role so you will have to go into office 2 days a week. Required Skills & Experience
3+ years of experience with Ruby on Rails and JavaScript
Computer Science Degree or related field
Needs to come into Office 2 days a week (Office located in Windsor)
Desired Skills & Experience
Familiarity with front end frameworks such as React, Vue or Angular
Experience with PostgreSQL and Git are a plus
What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown
50% Ruby on Rails, 50% Front End Development
Daily Responsibilities
Exhibit proficiency in writing exemplary code while ensuring comprehensive documentation.
Provide guidance and uphold architectural standards during code reviews.
Independently spearhead the implementation of significant features within expansive projects.
Furnish authoritative architectural recommendations and foster seamless team communication for informed decision-making.
You will receive the following benefits:
Personal and business development
Inclusive Environment (Don’t just hire on qualifications)
Work-life balance
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Claire Jewell
